On Wed, 26 Jan 2000, Naeeldar wrote:
> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
> Heh only 200 50. The diffrence is these 50's are not the average player we
> are all huge addicts and play a good 10 hours a day usually. So maybe you

Which is irrelevant from Verant's financial viewpoint because
they pay just as much as the person who plays 2 hours a week -
$9.69 a month. For some reason you seem to think that the
fact that you put more hours per day into this game should
give you some sort of higher priority. It doesn't. All those
hours you put into the game beyond what the average player
puts in is subsidized by all the people who play fewer hours
than the average player. Without them, this game would be
costing you on the order of $100/mo.

> should rethink that. Ok how many 49's? About 200 again. How many 48's about
> 300. How many 47's ? About 300 and so and so on. How many 46+ zones ? The

So we have 1300 L46-50 players. OTOH, we have (by a
conservative estimate) 7700 L1-45 players. 86% of the money
for this game is coming from non-L46-50 players. Given an
either/or choice, do they ignore 7700 players and risk losing
86% of their income, or ignore 1300 players and risk losing
14% of their income? That's a no-brainer to me, despite my
main character being L45.

> planes and I guess lower guk and sol b but they have level 30's in them and
> it's crowded in with the high levels. You also have kedge keep but the
> spawns in there is like 4-6 hours on most mobs so 2 good groups can go in
> and clear the spawns and leave. So you got sol b, lower guk, and the 3
> planes. Now even when we did all the planes that's about 30-40 in each
> plane. That's not even 10% of the 46+ people online. The dragons are a long
> spawn so they get done quickly and fire giants are a 8 hour spawn to. So you
> got all these 46+ people who play a good 10 hours at the least usually 5
> hours a day. So why do you think were ocmplaining now?

I don't think anyone is arguing that the high level zones
aren't overcrowded. What they're arguing is that L46+ stuff
shouldn't be Verant's top priority.
